tool_description: Analyzes incoming support tickets to extract key attributes like category, complexity, urgency, and required skills for proper routing and assignment.

ticket_id.description: Unique identifier for the support ticket

ticket_subject.description: Subject line of the support ticket

ticket_description.description: Detailed description of the customer issue

error_messages: Empty ticket content: Provide non-empty ticket_subject and ticket_description for analysis.
Invalid customer tier: Use one of [basic, premium, enterprise].
Ticket ID format error: Provide a valid alphanumeric ticket identifier.
usage: Provide ticket_id, ticket_subject, and ticket_description; optionally specify customer_tier. The tool returns categorized ticket attributes for routing decisions.

category.description: Primary category of the ticket (technical, billing, general)

subcategory.description: Specific subcategory within the main category

required_skills.description: List of skills required to handle this ticket

estimated_resolution_time.description: Estimated time to resolve in minutes
